justification: Offer misreads Team B’s situation. B’s only healthy QB is James Jones; trading him leaves them with an Out QB (Logan Clark), despite needing wins now and valuing dual-threat QBs. While the rookies match B’s upside preference and are healthy, they don’t address B’s immediate need at QB. The claim that B has QB depth is false, and the 0.7 acceptance is unrealistic. Rationale is generic and not grounded in specific roster constraints.
